acf.egsr_quicktip: YOU LIVE FOR THE STARS… AND YOU’LL REACH THEM BUT NEED TO DIRECT YOUR ENERGY WHERE IT COUNTS
acf.egsr_step1_descr:
Wow, how intriguing {FIRSTNAME}...

I’m picking up that you are an independent soul, your vibration is incredibly unique… mysterious… enigmatic… totally individual…

I sense a perfect combination within you… great determination alongside a go-with-the-flow nature… (most people have only one or the other)!

I can imagine you’re a big-picture thinker who can see connections easily… and have an original and quirky-quick intelligence, analytical but not aloof.

And… am I right to suggest that you can make hard things look so incredibly easy?

Maybe that’s because of your passion for discovering new things, places, and people... or because you simply find joy in the “journey”.

{FIRSTNAME}, I feel you are destined to achieve greatness in some form in this lifetime.

And I sense that you are at a crossroads in your life regarding moving toward that greatness now.

Your soul reading shows a strong drive to make the world a better place.

You are someone who never gives up… working towards something with fierce passion… until you believe it’s finally "good enough".

You probably think things through carefully before taking the leap, but your soul craves change and evolution… continuous growth… and searches for peace and freedom.

When you are at your best, all the different parts of your soul support each other, making you capable of perceiving the future… and propelling you forward toward your destiny with ease…

But... when your energy is misdirected, like electricity it can “short circuit”, blowing out your power in a bang… leaving you in the darkness, wondering exactly what happened.

And from my reading today, {FIRSTNAME}, I feel that you need an additional “Energy Reading” to discover exactly what’s been holding you back all these years…
acf.egsr_step2_descr:
YOU HAVE INTENSE PASSIONATE ENERGY THAT STRIVES FOR YOUR DREAMS, BUT REPRESSED EMOTIONS CAN BLOCK YOU.

Your energy reading shows different vibrations {FIRSTNAME}, which can make you unpredictable… even to yourself!

Let’s take a clear look at where your energy flows.

The positive flow manifests as a Sun Queen; open-minded, ready to listen, to lend a hand to whoever needs it… light in humor with a talent for bringing out the shine in others, lifting them up.

But… the negative flow manifests as an Ice Queen; certain of her own rightness, inflexible… uncompromising… which can often appear distant, cold, detached.

And when these energies clash, it can stir up uncomfortable emotions that you keep buried inside… where they can ignite with the smallest spark… exploding with force in lightning bursts of temper (and even rage).

For your energy to flow healthily and positively… and to have the peace and freedom your soul craves, you must find balance.

Balance is found by looking within… understanding your emotions, and releasing them in positive ways instead of allowing them to simmer below the surface... risking an explosion.

This is a very critical time on your path {FIRSTNAME}. The decisions you make at this time will have a huge impact on your life for years to come.

The way to know if you’re on the right path is usually found through a light reading… I’d like to give you one for free but first I need to ask you a few questions…
acf.egsr_step3_descr:
Your light reading is STRONG {FIRSTNAME} and has the potential to shine like a flawless diamond.

I believe there’s a great opportunity on the horizon for you…

You have a sharp mind that creates brilliant, original ideas... and you are already excellent at communicating them to others.

Now is the time to look within. To look at any repressed emotions and let them out… like opening a pressure valve to let off steam... slowly and painlessly… instead of waiting until they explode, ruining all the hard work you do.

You can easily learn to express your emotions in a healthy way… so that your beautiful, passionate and charismatic light can really make a difference in the world.
